entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
